RoomSettingsContent.title: Sow labɛncogo .

tabs.privacy: Kunnafoni minnu bɛ sɔrɔ yɔrɔ la .

RoomSettingsContent.loadError: A ma se ka so sigicogo doni .

leaveRoom.confirm: Yala i b’a fɛ ka bɔ so kɔnɔ wa? I bɔlen kɔ yen, i tɛna se ka taa a fɛ ka cikanw sɔrɔ ka bɔ nin so in kɔnɔ.
leaveRoom.success: A bɔra so kɔnɔ ka ɲɛ .
leaveRoom.error: A ma se ka bɔ so kɔnɔ, aw ka segin ka a lajɛ .
